column4: hello guys... I need help with bittorrent client please. It does not download anything for some reason, it just stays there idle even though there are connected peers available
any idea as to why bittorrent won't download anything please?
how would I know that please?
i use TRansission but also in bittorent there could be a configuration window
look for 'port ' or something related to
I'm in the network preferences menu... two submenus are available: network setup and file transers
under network setup: Proxy Server (hostname, port, type, use proxy for)  and Proxy Authentication (use authentication check box)
under File transfers: Network Settings: DCC IP Address
it's the way the pc receive and send data (torrent flow in this case)
